algorithm_technique: Using sets to efficiently find differences between elements of two arrays.
problem_summary_simple: Find distinct elements unique to each of two arrays.
problem_summary_technical: Leverage set operations (difference) to find elements present in one array but not the other.
key_insights: Sets provide O(1) average time complexity for membership testing and difference operations.
Converting arrays to sets automatically handles duplicate removal.
The problem is efficiently solved by performing two set difference operations.
